title: Strengthening Teaching Practice Competencies: IT-Integrated Projects for Foundational Mathematics Job Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life mathematics problems (e.g., budget calculations, data visualization) with 80% accuracy using IT tools.
Learners can document and share problem-solving processes using digital collaboration platforms through PBL team projects.
Learners can achieve at least 75% mastery of weekly mathematics concepts through formative assessments provided in a learning management system (LMS).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
